item.title: Auto giants endured a torrid time of it this year â€” and few expect 2025 to be much better
item.description: A perfect storm of challenges for the European automobile industry shows no sign of letting up, analysts say.

item.title: Luigi Mangione rages about 'insult' to American people, challenges UnitedHealthcare murder extradition
item.description: Luigi Mangione is accused of killing UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson outside a Hilton hotel in New York City before fleeing to Pennsylvania last w...

item.title: Annual inflation rate accelerates to 2.7% in November, as expected
item.description: The consumer price index was expected to rise 0.3% in November and 2.7% from a year ago.

item.title: Apple launches its ChatGPT integration with Siri
item.description: Apple released new versions of its iPhone, iPad, and Mac software on Wednesday that include the long-awaited ChatGPT integration with Siri.

item.title: Mortgage refinance demand surges 27%, as interest rates drop for the third straight week
item.description: Mortgage rates fell again last week, and while the drop wasn't huge, it was enough to spur current homeowners to look for some savings.
